channel.title: Rename the Psycho King to the Mad King
channel.description:
This isn't a terribly big suggestion, but "Psycho" feels a bit out-of-theme for the game. I suggest renaming the Psycho King to the Mad King, which is much more setting-appropriate.
(Googling, the word "Psychosis" only dates to the 1850's, and "Psycho" as a slang term for it is even more recent - the first recorded usage of the term is from 1935! Whereas "The Mad King" is of course a term that has had a lot of historical usage.)

item.title: Rename the Psycho King to the Mad King
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Mentally Disabled King? What? Who would even think to call a King in a game that?

But /support to change him to Mad King.

Read full topic
item.source: Rename the Psycho King to the Mad King

item.title: Rename the Psycho King to the Mad King
item.dc:creator: w1ngz
item.description:
Yes please.

“Psycho” is evolving as a slur in keeping with rising social awareness about mental illnesses (finally). Please rename him to Mad King or something else that isn’t “Crazy/Psycho/Mentally Disabled King.”

I know the devs are sensitive to these sorts of issues, so it’s worth pointing out. Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Rename the Psycho King to the Mad King

item.title: Rename the Psycho King to the Mad King
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
/support

Fool King could be something else @Marluxion, but it’s unlikely to happen imo

(Googling, the word “Psychosis” only dates to the 1850’s, and “Psycho” as a slang term for it is even more recent - the first recorded usage of the term is from 1935! Whereas “The Mad King” is of course a term that has had a lot of historical usage.)
